article.description: — Malachi Smith had 18 points and 11 rebounds as Chattanooga beat Bellarmine 77-68 on Wednesday night.
article.headline: Smith leads Chattanooga past Bellarmine 77-68
article.story: LOUISVILLE, Ky. -- — Malachi Smith had 18 points and 11 rebounds as Chattanooga beat Bellarmine 77-68 on Wednesday night. Jamaal Walker and A.J. Caldwell added 15 points each for Chattanooga (5-0). David Jean-Baptiste had 14 points and Caldwell had eight rebounds. Pedro Bradshaw had 22 points and six rebounds for the Knights (1-2). Dylan Penn added 19 points and six assists, and Alec Pfriem had seven rebounds. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
